reason: User reported runtime error: ArgumentValidationError with sortBy parameter. Convex dev hasn't regenerated API types after adding sortBy to getBacklinks args in convex/backlinks.ts. Fix: removed sortBy from query call temporarily.
thinking_process: The sortBy parameter was added to convex/backlinks.ts query args, but Convex dev process hasn't regenerated the API types yet. Temporarily removing sortBy from the useQuery call in page.tsx until Convex regenerates types. See tasks_progress_verbose.txt for investigation details.
